channel.title: Fally PvP Delta
channel.description:
. [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/phatzpvpgreen.png[/img]
[img]http://i46.servimg.com/u/f46/16/86/86/10/untitl14.png[/img]
[b][size=13pt]WEBSITE:[/size][/b] www.phatzpvp.com [b][size=10pt]New Client Download: [/size][/b] http://uppit.com/hbohtpftn2y6/Phatz_Pvp_client.rar
[b][size=10pt] I made this project to bring back those good days of frostiescape, and any other cammy PvP server. Sadly it seems like everybody is moving onto PI shit, and no more oldschool. Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I hope to bring back what Phatzpvp was and some better features. There will never be any rollbacks, dupes, server problems, etc. This brings us to the server features: ::dice command flower game 100% pvp Changed fairy rewards Fixed headicons Fixed trading No lag, antilag system. ::votem ::voter ::voters client sided. donator zone that checks if your donator with the command and killing the dragons. custom quests Anti bombs attack npcs Fixed syi obv. changed quest tab[/size][/b] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/fally1.png[/img] [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/serverd1.png[/img]

[size=10pt] I made this project to bring back those good days of frostiescape, and any other cammy PvP server. Sadly it seems like everybody is moving onto PI shit, and no more oldschool.
Any other cammy pvp server normally lasts about a week or less. I hope to bring back what Phatzpvp was and some better features. There will never be any rollbacks, dupes, server problems, etc.
This brings us to the server features:
::dice command
flower game
100% pvp
Changed fairy rewards
Fixed headicons
Fixed trading
No lag, antilag system.
::votem ::voter ::voters client sided.
donator zone that checks if your donator
with the command and killing the dragons.
custom quests
Anti bombs attack npcs
Fixed syi obv.
changed quest tab[/size]
